name: Dhupguri Tista Torsha Foundation
briefDescription: Dhupguri Tista Torsha Foundation, "help to walk" it's a non profit organization, registered under societies registration act XXVI of 1961, Registration number- S/2L NO29843 of 2014-2015, established on twenty third December 2014 from a small town Dhupguri. The behaviour of this ngo is help to organize self-help group at grassroots level, arrange awareness campaign at village against early marriage, important of girls education, discuss adolescent problems, woman trafficking and many other important topics. We also work for rural development, women empowerment, provide information about agricultural, encourage for various types of vocational training, adult education, anti tobacco campaign, rescue street dogs.

address: Prabaha Tista Torsha, Satsang Para, Ward no-11,
